title: Hochschild cohomology of graded gentle algebras and intrinsic formality
summary: We describe the (bigraded) Hochschild cohomology of graded gentle algebras along with the Gerstenhaber bracket and cup product. In particular, this yields a description of the Hochschild cohomology of partially wrapped Fukaya categories of surfaces in the sense of Haiden-Katzarkov-Kontsevich which have at least one stop. Our results are an important ingredient in the author's recent description of the derived Picard group of partially wrapped Fukaya categories and graded gentle algebras. As another application we provide a characterisation of intrinsically formal graded gentle algebras under mild assumptions.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了分级温和代数的双分级Hochschild上同调，包括Gerstenhaber括号和杯积结构，并应用于Fukaya范畴和Picard群的研究。
AI.motivation: 研究分级温和代数的Hochschild上同调结构，为理解部分包裹的Fukaya范畴的代数性质提供基础，特别是为作者最近关于这些范畴的导出Picard群描述提供关键工具。
AI.method: 描述了分级温和代数的双分级Hochschild上同调结构，包括Gerstenhaber括号和杯积的具体构造。特别关注了Haiden-Katzarkov-Kontsevich意义下具有至少一个停止点的曲面的部分包裹Fukaya范畴。
AI.result: 获得了分级温和代数Hochschild上同调的完整描述，为部分包裹Fukaya范畴提供了相应的上同调结构。在温和假设下，给出了本质形式的分级温和代数的特征刻画。
AI.conclusion: 本文的结果为分级温和代数和部分包裹Fukaya范畴的代数结构提供了重要理解，特别是在导出Picard群的研究中起到关键作用，并为本质形式代数的识别提供了新工具。

title: Type $G_2$ Quantum Subgroups from Graph Planar Algebra Embeddings
summary: We give graphical presentations for the two quantum subgroups of type $G_2$. To do this we use a method of extending a tensor category by embedding the planar algebra of a $\otimes$-generating object into the graph planar algebra of this object's fundamental graph. This allows the use of computational methods to uncover relations we would have little hope of arriving at otherwise.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了G2型两个量子子群的图形表示方法，通过将张量范畴中对象的平面代数嵌入到其基本图的图平面代数中，利用计算方法发现难以通过其他方式得到的关系。
AI.motivation: 研究G2型量子子群的图形表示问题，传统方法难以发现这些量子子群中的复杂关系，需要开发新的计算方法来揭示这些结构。
AI.method: 通过将张量范畴中⊗-生成对象的平面代数嵌入到该对象基本图的图平面代数中，扩展张量范畴，利用计算方法发现量子子群中的关系。
AI.result: 成功获得了G2型两个量子子群的图形表示，通过计算方法揭示了传统方法难以发现的结构关系。
AI.conclusion: 该方法有效解决了量子子群图形表示的计算问题，为研究量子群和子群结构提供了新的计算工具和视角。

title: Localization of Singularities and Universal Geometric Rank Bounds in the Satake Correspondence
summary: This article introduces a framework for the localization and isolation of singularities in the affine Grassmannian. Our primary result is a structural factorization of the transition matrix $C$ between the Mirković--Vilonen (MV) basis and the convolution basis into $C = P \cdot M \cdot A \cdot Q^{-1}$, where the four factors represent: equivariant localization ($Q$), fusion via nearby cycles ($A$), local intersection cohomology stalks ($M$), and diagonal normalization ($P$). Utilizing this factorization, and by introducing the Geometric Efficiency metric ($η$) we establish a Universal Geometric Rank Bound, proving that the rank of the transition matrix $C$ is bounded by the dimension of the local Braden--MacPherson (BMP) stalks.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了仿射格拉斯曼流形中奇点定位与隔离的框架，通过将MV基与卷积基之间的转移矩阵C分解为四个因子，并引入几何效率度量η，建立了通用几何秩界。
AI.motivation: 研究仿射格拉斯曼流形中奇点的定位与隔离问题，旨在理解MV基与卷积基之间的转换关系，并为相关矩阵的秩提供几何约束。
AI.method: 提出了结构分解框架：将转移矩阵C分解为四个因子P·M·A·Q^{-1}，分别表示等变定位、近周融合、局部相交上同调茎和归一化。引入几何效率度量η，并利用分解建立通用几何秩界。
AI.result: 证明了转移矩阵C的秩受限于局部Braden-MacPherson茎的维数，建立了通用几何秩界，为仿射格拉斯曼流形中的奇点分析提供了新的工具和结果。
AI.conclusion: 通过结构分解和几何效率度量的引入，成功建立了仿射格拉斯曼流形中奇点定位与隔离的理论框架，为相关几何表示论问题提供了新的研究途径。

title: Hochschild cohomology of graded skew-gentle algebras: Gerstenhaber algebra structure and geometric interpretation
summary: In this paper we calculate the Hochschild cohomology of graded skew-gentle algebras, together with its structure as graded commutative algebra under the cup product and its Lie algebra structure given by the Gerstenhaber bracket. One of the results of this paper is that for graded skew-gentle algebras and thus also for partially wrapped Fukaya categories of orbifold surfaces with stops, their Hochschild cohomology is encoded in the underlying graded surface.

AI.tldr: 本文计算了分次斜温和代数的Hochschild上同调，包括其作为分次交换代数的杯积结构和Gerstenhaber括号给出的李代数结构，并证明这些结构可由底层分次曲面编码。
AI.motivation: 研究分次斜温和代数的Hochschild上同调代数结构，特别是其作为分次交换代数的杯积结构和Gerstenhaber括号给出的李代数结构，这对于理解相关Fukaya范畴的代数性质具有重要意义。
AI.method: 通过代数计算的方法，对分次斜温和代数进行Hochschild上同调的计算，分析其杯积结构和Gerstenhaber括号结构，建立与底层分次曲面的对应关系。
AI.result: 成功计算了分次斜温和代数的Hochschild上同调，确定了其作为分次交换代数的结构和Gerstenhaber括号给出的李代数结构，并证明这些结构完全由底层分次曲面决定。
AI.conclusion: 分次斜温和代数的Hochschild上同调代数结构可由其底层分次曲面完全编码，这一结果也适用于具有停止的orbifold曲面的部分包裹Fukaya范畴。

title: Compatibility of Drinfeld presentations and $q$-characters for affine Kac-Moody quantum symmetric pairs: quasi-split case
summary: Let $(\mathbf{U}, \mathbf{U}^\imath)$ be a quasi-split affine quantum symmetric pair of type $\mathsf{AIII}$. This case is of particular interest thanks to the existence of geometric realizations and Schur--Weyl dualities. We establish factorization and coproduct formulae for the Drinfeld--Cartan series $\boldsymbolΘ_i(z)$ in the Lu--Pan--Wang--Zhang `new Drinfeld'-style presentation, generalizing the split type results from [Prz23, LP25a]. As an application, we construct a boundary analogue of the $q$-character map, and show that it is compatible with Frenkel and Reshetikhin's original $q$-character homomorphism.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了AIII型拟分裂仿射量子对称对，建立了Drinfeld-Cartan级数的分解和余积公式，并构造了边界q-特征映射
AI.motivation: AIII型拟分裂仿射量子对称对具有几何实现和Schur-Weyl对偶性，这使其成为特别有意义的研究对象。作者希望推广分裂类型的结果，建立更一般的分解和余积公式。
AI.method: 使用Lu-Pan-Wang-Zhang的"新Drinfeld"风格表示，建立Drinfeld-Cartan级数$\boldsymbolΘ_i(z)$的分解公式和余积公式。然后应用这些结果构造边界q-特征映射。
AI.result: 成功建立了AIII型拟分裂仿射量子对称对中Drinfeld-Cartan级数的分解和余积公式，推广了分裂类型的结果。构造了边界q-特征映射，并证明其与Frenkel和Reshetikhin的原始q-特征同态兼容。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为AIII型拟分裂仿射量子对称对建立了重要的代数结构公式，并成功构造了边界q-特征映射，为进一步研究这类量子对称对的表示理论提供了有力工具。

title: Noncommutative tensor triangular geometry: modules, bimodules, and unipotent Hopf algebras
summary: We initiate a program aimed at classifying thick ideals, Balmer spectra, and submodule categories of various stable categories of bimodules and modules for finite dimensional selfinjective algebras, and at clarifying the relationship between the universal Balmer support and the Hochschild cohomology support. In this paper, we focus mostly on the case of a unipotent Hopf algebra $A$. The stable category $\underline{\mathsf{lrp}}(A^{\mathsf{env}})$ of $A$-bimodules that are projective as left and as right $A$-modules is a monoidal triangulated category under $\otimes_A$, and acts naturally on the stable category $\underline{\mathsf{mod}}(A)$ of $A$. We show in this case that the Balmer spectrum $\mathsf{Spc}(\mathcal{E})$ of the thick subcategory ${\mathcal E}$ of $\underline{\mathsf{lrp}}(A^{\mathsf{env}})$ generated by $A$ is homeomorphic to $\mathsf{Spc}(\underline{\mathsf{mod}}(A))$ and defines an embedding $\mathsf{Spc}(\underline{\mathsf{mod}}(A)) \to \mathsf{Spc}(\underline{\mathsf{mod}}(A^{\mathsf{env}}))$. Subject to a conjectural description of spectra of finite tensor categories, we show that the spectrum of ${\mathcal E}$ is homeomorphic to ${\mathsf{Proj}}$ of the Hochschild cohomology ring of $A$, and that the Hochschild support coincides with the universal Balmer support. We show that any subcategory ${\mathcal K}$ of $\underline{\mathsf{lrp}}(A^{\mathsf{env}})$ containing a thick generator admits a surjective continuous map from $\mathsf{Spc}(\underline{\mathsf{mod}}(A))$. As a consequence, under the aforementioned conjecture, this spectrum is Noetherian, classifies the thick ideals of ${\mathcal K}$, and classifies thick ${\mathcal K}$-submodule categories of $\underline{\mathsf{mod}}(A)$ via the Stevenson module-theoretic support. As examples, we present in detail the representations of finite $p$-groups.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究单幂Hopf代数A的稳定范畴，证明了Balmer谱与Hochschild上同调谱的对应关系，并建立了厚理想分类的理论框架。
AI.motivation: 本文旨在分类有限维自内射代数的稳定范畴中的厚理想、Balmer谱和子模范畴，并澄清通用Balmer支撑与Hochschild上同调支撑之间的关系。特别关注单幂Hopf代数的情况。
AI.method: 研究单幂Hopf代数A的稳定范畴：左-右投射A-双模范畴的稳定范畴和A-模范畴的稳定范畴。通过张量积构造幺半三角范畴结构，分析其Balmer谱的拓扑性质，并建立与Hochschild上同调环谱的对应关系。
AI.result: 证明了由A生成的厚子范畴的Balmer谱与A-模范畴的稳定范畴的Balmer谱同胚，并定义了到双模范畴稳定范畴谱的嵌入。在有限张量范畴谱的猜想描述下，该谱与A的Hochschild上同调环的射影谱同胚，且两种支撑理论一致。还证明了相关谱的Noether性及其对厚理想的分类能力。
AI.conclusion: 本文为单幂Hopf代数建立了厚理想分类的理论框架，揭示了Balmer谱与Hochschild上同调谱的深刻联系，为有限p-群表示等具体例子提供了详细分析，推进了稳定范畴中支撑理论的研究。

title: Schur--Weyl Equivalences for Wreath Product Superalgebras
comment: 17 pages, Version 2 has various minor corrections and improvements to exposition
summary: Let $A$ be an associative superalgebra over a field of characteristic zero. Let $n \geq d+1$. The main result of the paper establishes an equivalence of categories between supermodules for the wreath product $ S_{d} \wr A$ and an explicitly defined category of supermodules for the general linear Lie algebra $\mathfrak{gl}_{n}(A)$. We also give an example showing the bound $n \geq d+1$ cannot be improved.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了对称群S_d与代数A的wreath积S_d≀A的超模范畴与一般线性李代数gl_n(A)的超模范畴之间的等价关系，要求n≥d+1，并证明这个界是最优的。
AI.motivation: 研究特征零域上结合超代数A的表示理论，探索对称群与代数的wreath积的表示与一般线性李代数表示之间的深刻联系，为超代数表示理论提供新的范畴等价工具。
AI.method: 通过范畴等价的方法，在n≥d+1的条件下，构造从S_d≀A的超模范畴到gl_n(A)的超模范畴的显式等价函子，并证明其逆函子的存在性。
AI.result: 建立了S_d≀A的超模范畴与gl_n(A)的超模范畴之间的范畴等价，并给出反例证明n≥d+1这个条件是最优的，不能改进。
AI.conclusion: 该研究揭示了wreath积表示与一般线性李代数表示之间的深刻对应关系，为超代数表示理论提供了新的视角和工具，同时确定了等价成立的最优参数条件。

title: (Co)homological vanishing for non-additive representations of a semi-additive category
summary: We show the vanishing of higher extension groups and torsion groups between linearisation of additive functors from a semi-additive category satisfying some conditions to a category of vector spaces. In particular, we apply our results to the category of correspondences functors of Bouc-Thévenaz.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了在满足特定条件的半加性范畴到向量空间范畴的线性化加性函子之间，高阶扩张群和挠群的消失，并将结果应用于Bouc-Thévenaz的对应函子范畴。
AI.motivation: 研究加性函子的线性化问题，特别是探讨在特定范畴结构中高阶扩张群和挠群的消失现象，这对于理解函子范畴的同调性质具有重要意义。
AI.method: 通过建立半加性范畴到向量空间范畴的线性化加性函子之间的理论框架，利用范畴论和同调代数方法，证明在满足特定条件时高阶扩张群和挠群的消失定理。
AI.result: 证明了在满足条件的半加性范畴到向量空间范畴的线性化加性函子之间，所有高阶扩张群和挠群都消失为零，并将这一结果成功应用于Bouc-Thévenaz的对应函子范畴。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为加性函子的线性化提供了重要的同调性质结果，特别是在对应函子范畴中建立了高阶扩张群和挠群的消失定理，拓展了范畴论和同调代数的应用范围。

title: Constructing Chayet-Garibaldi algebras from affine vertex algebras (including the 3876-dimensional algebra for $E_8$)
summary:
In 2021, Maurice Chayet and Skip Garibaldi provided an explicit construction of a commutative non-associative algebra on the second smallest representation of $E_8$ (of dimension $3875$) adjoined with a unit. In fact, they define such an algebra $A(\mathfrak{g})$ for each simple Lie algebra $\mathfrak{g}$, in terms of explicit but ad-hoc formulas.
  We discovered that their algebras $A(\mathfrak{g})$ have a natural interpretation in terms of affine vertex algebras, and their ad-hoc formulas take an extremely simple form in this new interpretation. It is our hope that this point of view will lead to a better understanding of this interesting class of algebras.

AI.tldr: 该论文发现Chayet和Garibaldi构造的基于简单李代数的非结合代数A(𝔤)可以通过仿射顶点代数得到自然解释，使原本的ad-hoc公式变得极其简单。
AI.motivation: Chayet和Garibaldi在2021年为每个简单李代数𝔤构造了非结合代数A(𝔤)，特别是对E_8的第二最小表示（维度3875）添加单位元的情况。然而，他们的构造使用了明确的但ad-hoc的公式，缺乏自然解释。
AI.method: 作者发现这些代数A(𝔤)可以通过仿射顶点代数得到自然解释。在这种新的解释框架下，原本复杂的ad-hoc公式变得极其简单。
AI.result: 成功建立了A(𝔤)代数与仿射顶点代数之间的自然联系，为这些代数提供了更深刻的理论基础，简化了原有的构造公式。
AI.conclusion: 通过仿射顶点代数的视角重新解释Chayet和Garibaldi的代数构造，不仅简化了公式，而且有望促进对这一有趣代数类的更好理解。

title: Twists of superconformal algebras
summary: We take first steps toward a theory of ``conformal twists'' for superconformal field theories in dimension 3 to 6, extending the well-known analysis of twists for supersymmetric theories. A conformal twist is a square-zero odd element in the superconformal Lie algebra, and we classify all twists and describe their orbits under the adjoint action of the superconformal group. We work mostly with the complexified superconformal algebras, unless explicitly stated otherwise; real forms of the superconformal algebra may have important physical implications, but we only discuss these subtleties in a few special cases. Conformal twists can give rise to interesting subalgebras and protected sectors of operators in a superconformal field theory, with the Donaldson--Witten topological field theory and the vertex operator algebras of 4-dimensional N=2 SCFTs being prominent examples. To obtain mathematical precision, we explain how to extract vertex algebras and E_n algebras from a twisted superconformal field theory using factorization algebras.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了3-6维超共形场论中的"共形扭曲"理论，扩展了超对称理论中的扭曲分析。共形扭曲是超共形李代数中的平方零奇元素，作者分类了所有扭曲并描述了它们在超共形群伴随作用下的轨道。
AI.motivation: 扩展超对称理论中的扭曲分析到超共形场论，研究共形扭曲如何产生有趣的子代数和受保护算子扇区，如Donaldson-Witten拓扑场论和4维N=2超共形场论的顶点算子代数。
AI.method: 主要使用复化的超共形代数，分类所有共形扭曲并描述它们在超共形群伴随作用下的轨道。通过因子化代数从扭曲的超共形场论中提取顶点代数和E_n代数。
AI.result: 建立了3-6维超共形场论中"共形扭曲"的理论框架，分类了所有扭曲及其轨道，展示了如何从扭曲理论中提取数学结构如顶点代数和E_n代数。
AI.conclusion: 共形扭曲理论为研究超共形场论提供了新视角，能够揭示有趣的子代数和受保护算子扇区，为理解Donaldson-Witten拓扑场论和4维N=2超共形场论的顶点算子代数等结构提供了理论基础。

title: Alternating and symmetric superpowers of metric generalized Jordan superpairs
comment: 30 pages. To appear in Linear Algebra and its Applications
summary: The aim of this paper is to define and study the constructions of alternating and symmetric (super)powers of metric generalized Jordan (super)pairs. These constructions are obtained by transference via the Faulkner construction. The construction of tensor (super)products for metric generalized Jordan (super)pairs is revisited. We always assume that the characteristic of the base field $\mathbb{F}$ is different from $2$; in case of positive characteristic, sometimes we require that the characteristic is large enough to allow nondegeneracy of certain bilinear forms.

AI.tldr: 本文定义了度量广义Jordan（超）对的交替和对称（超）幂构造，通过Faulkner构造进行转移，并重新审视了张量（超）积的构造。
AI.motivation: 研究度量广义Jordan（超）对的交替和对称（超）幂构造，扩展Jordan代数和超代数理论中的构造方法。
AI.method: 通过Faulkner构造进行转移，定义交替和对称（超）幂，并重新审视张量（超）积的构造方法。
AI.result: 建立了度量广义Jordan（超）对的交替和对称（超）幂构造理论，完善了张量（超）积的构造框架。
AI.conclusion: 成功定义了度量广义Jordan（超）对的交替和对称（超）幂构造，为相关代数结构的研究提供了新的工具和方法。
